name: cloud_manual_work_item_summary_name
subject:
#set($numberOfPendingTasks = $__numberTool.integer($numberOfPendingTasks))#set($taskTasks = "#if($numberOfPendingTasks == 1)task#{else}tasks#end")
You have $numberOfPendingTasks $taskTasks to complete in ${__global.productName}.
body:
#set($numberOfPendingTasks = $__numberTool.integer($numberOfPendingTasks)) #set($isAre = "#if( $numberOfPendingTasks == 1)is#{else}are#end") #set($taskTasks = "#if( $numberOfPendingTasks == 1)task#{else}tasks#end") #set($url = "${__global.productUrl}/ui/main#launch:tasks") There $isAre $numberOfPendingTasks $taskTasks waiting for you in your $__global.productName Task Manager.
Use each task's details to finish it on the source, then mark it as complete in ${__global.productName}. To do this work, go to the task manager here, or copy and paste this link into your browser: $url

name: cloud_manual_tasks_name
subject: You have a task from $__global.productName
footer: Don't ever reply to this email for you shall hear crickets

name: non_employee_request_created_name
subject: Youâ€™ve requested a non-employee account for ${data.firstName} ${data.lastName}
body:
#set($_sourceName = $data.nonEmployeeSource.name) #set($_approverIds = $__util.getObjectByJsonPath($__contentJson, '$.data.approvalItems[*].approver.id'))

Your request for a non-employee account for $data.accountName on the source $_sourceName was successfully submitted.

#if($_approverIds.size() > 0) #if($_approverIds.size() == 1)

$__util.getUser($_approverIds[0]).name must approve this account request before it can be added to the source.

#elseif($_approverIds.size() > 1)

The following reviewers must approve this account request before it can be added to the source:

    #foreach($_approverId in $_approverIds)
  • $__util.getUser($_approverId).name
    • #end
#end

You will be notified when a decision is made about this account request. You can check the status of your request by clicking Manage Non-Employees on the dashboard and viewing the $_sourceName source.

#{else}

This account will be added to $_sourceName shortly. You can check its status by clicking Manage Non-Employees on the dashboard and viewing the $_sourceName source.

#end

name: non_employee_approval_required_name
subject: Review the non-employee account requested for ${data.firstName} ${data.lastName}
body:
#set($_sourceName = $data.nonEmployeeSource.name) #set($_requestedForDisplayName = "${data.firstName} ${data.lastName}") #set($_pendingApprovalItem = $__util.getObjectByJsonPath($__contentJson, "$.data.approvalItems[?(@.approvalStatus == 'PENDING')]").get(0)) #set($_approvedApprovalItems = $__util.getObjectByJsonPath($__contentJson, "$.data.approvalItems[?(@.approvalStatus == 'APPROVED')]")) #set($_notReadyApprovalItems = $__util.getObjectByJsonPath($__contentJson, "$.data.approvalItems[?(@.approvalStatus == 'NOT_READY')]")) #set($_requester = $__util.getUser($data.requester.id))

$_requester.name has requested a new non-employee account for $_requestedForDisplayName on the source $_sourceName.

#set($_approvalCenterUrl = "${__global.productUrl}/ui/d/approvals/requested-items")

Please visit the Approvals center to review this request.

#if($_approvedApprovalItems.size()>0)

#foreach($_approvedItem in $_approvedApprovalItems)#if($foreach.count!=1) and #end$__util.getUser($_approvedItem.approver.id).name#end have approved this account.

#end #if($_notReadyApprovalItems.size()>0)

#foreach($_notReadyApprovalItem in $_notReadyApprovalItems)#if($foreach.count!=1) and #end$__util.getUser($_notReadyApprovalItem.approver.id).name#end will review this account request if you approve it.

#end #if($_pendingApprovalItem.approvalOrder == $data.approvalItems.size() - 1)

If you approve this non-employee account request, an account for $_requestedForDisplayName with the account ID $data.accountName will be created in $__global.productName.

#end

name: non_employee_request_action_completed_name
subject: Your non-employee account request for ${data.firstName} ${data.lastName} was $data.approvalStatus
body:
#set($_sourceName = $data.nonEmployeeSource.name) #set($_userDisplayName = "${data.firstName} ${data.lastName}") #set($_approvalStatus = $data.approvalStatus) #set($_createdDate = $__dateTool.toDate("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX", $data.created))

On $__dateTool.format('yyyy-MM-dd', $_createdDate), you requested a non-employee account for $_userDisplayName on the source $_sourceName.

#if($_approvalStatus == "APPROVED")

This request has been approved. A new $__global.productName account for this user is being processed. The user name for this account will be $data.accountName.

#elseif ($_approvalStatus == "REJECTED") #set($_rejectorIds = $__util.getObjectByJsonPath($__contentJson, "$.data.approvalItems[?(@.approvalStatus == 'REJECTED')].approver.id")) #foreach($_rejectorId in $_rejectorIds) #set($_rejector = $__util.getUser($_rejectorId)) #set($_completionDate = $__dateTool.toDate("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX", $data.completionDate))

$_rejector.name denied your request on $__dateTool.format('yyyy-MM-dd', $_completionDate).

Please contact $_rejector.name if you have any questions.

#end #elseif ($_approvalStatus == "CANCELLED")

This request has been cancelled because one or more reviewers in the review process has been removed from the system.

You can resubmit the request in $__global.productName.

#end #set($_commentApprovalItems = $__util.getObjectByJsonPath($__contentJson, "$.data.approvalItems[?(@.comment!=null)]")) #if($_commentApprovalItems.size()>0) #foreach($_approvalItem in $_commentApprovalItems) $__util.getUser(${_approvalItem.approver.id}).name provided the following additional information:
$_approvalItem.comment
#end #end

name: non_employee_term_end_date_near_name
subject: Reminder: The end date for $data.expiringNonEmployees.size() non-employee#if($data.nonEmployeeIds.size()>1)s#end is in 7 days
body:
#set($_sourceName = $data.sourceName) #set($_expiringNonEmployees = $data.expiringNonEmployees) #set($_productName = $__global.productName) #set($_nonEmployeeSourceUrl = "${__global.productUrl}/ui/d/dashboard/non-employees/sources/$data.sourceId") #macro( showName $_nonEmployee ) $_nonEmployee.firstName $_nonEmployee.lastName ($_nonEmployee.accountName) #end

You are receiving this email because youâ€™re listed as an account manager for the non-employee source $_sourceName in $_productName.

#if ($_expiringNonEmployees.size()==1)

The end date for the non-employee #showName($_expiringNonEmployees[0]) is in 7 days.

Your admin may have configured these non-employees to lose access to $_productName on their end date.

#elseif ($_expiringNonEmployees.size()>1)

The end date for $_expiringNonEmployees.size() non-employees in $_productName is in 7 days.

Your admin may have configured these non-employees to lose access to $_productName on their end date. The following users are included in this list:

    #foreach($_expireNonEmployee in $_expiringNonEmployees) #if($foreach.count==21) #break #end
  • #showName($_expireNonEmployee)
    • #end
#if ($_expiringNonEmployees.size()> 20) #set($_additionalExpireNonEmployee = $_expiringNonEmployees.size() - 20)

The complete list includes $_additionalExpireNonEmployee additional#if($_additionalExpireNonEmployee==1) identity#else identities#end. Visit the $_sourceName account list to view the complete list.

#end #end

You can change the end date for#if($_expiringNonEmployees.size()==1) this#else these#end and other users in the $_sourceName source in $_productName. Â

name: non_employee_bulk_import_failed_email_notification_name
subject:
#set($_sourceName = $data.sourceName)
Your non-employee account upload for the $_sourceName source failed
body:
#set($_sourceName = $data.sourceName) #set($_sourceId = $data.sourceId) #set($url = "${__global.productUrl}/ui/d/dashboard/non-employees/sources/$_sourceId") #set($_date = $__dateTool.toDate("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX", $data.dateTime)) #set($_formattedDate = $__dateTool.format("EEEEE, MMMMM dd, YYYY", $_date)) #set($_formattedTime = $__dateTool.format("h:mm a", $_date)) #set($_errorMessage = $data.errorMessage) The non-employee account upload you started for the $_sourceName source on $_formattedDate at $_formattedTime failed.

The system provided this error message: $_errorMessage

You can see all accounts on this source in $__global.productName.

name: non_employee_bulk_import_passed_email_notification_name
subject:
#set($_sourceName = $data.sourceName)
Your non-employee account upload for the $_sourceName source has succeeded
body:
#set($_sourceName = $data.sourceName) #set($_sourceId = $data.sourceId) #set($url = "${__global.productUrl}/ui/d/dashboard/non-employees/sources/$_sourceId") #set($_date = $__dateTool.toDate("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX", $data.dateTime)) #set($_formattedDate = $__dateTool.format("EEEEE, MMMMM dd, YYYY", $_date)) #set($_formattedTime = $__dateTool.format("h:mm a", $_date)) #set($_totalAccounts = $data.numProcessedAccounts.intValue()) #set($_changedAccounts = $data.numChangedAccounts.intValue()) #set($_unChangedAccounts = $data.numUnchangedAccounts.intValue()) #set($_newAccounts = $data.numNewAccounts.intValue()) The non-employee account upload you started for the $_sourceName source on $_formattedDate at $_formattedTime succeeded.

This file contained $_totalAccounts account#if($_totalAccounts!=1)s#end. Based on this upload:

  • $_newAccounts new non-employee account#if($_newAccounts!=1)s were#{else} was#end created.
  • $_changedAccounts existing non-employee account#if($_changedAccounts!=1)s were#{else} was#end updated.
  • $_unChangedAccounts account#if($_unChangedAccounts!=1)s were#{else} was#end unchanged.

You can see all non-employee accounts on this source in $__global.productName.

name: campaign_template_pregen_notification_name
subject: Reminder: Your Certification Campaign is Scheduled to Start in 7 Days
body: The certification $campaignTemplateName is scheduled to generate a campaign in 7 days. If you need to make any changes or updates to the contents of this campaign, please do so before ${generationDate}.

teamsTemplate.title: Your request for access to **$__esc.javascript($requestedItemsStatus[0].name)** was denied.
teamsTemplate.messageJson:
{
    "type": "AdaptiveCard",
    "body": [
        {
            "type": "TextBlock",
            "text": "**Request denied** 

 Your request for access to#if($requestedItemsStatus[0].clientMetadata)#if($requestedItemsStatus[0].clientMetadata.requestedAppName) **$__esc.javascript($requestedItemsStatus[0].clientMetadata.requestedAppName)** with#end **$__esc.javascript($requestedItemsStatus[0].name)** access#{else} **$__esc.javascript($requestedItemsStatus[0].name)**#end was denied.
#if($requestedItemsStatus[0].approvalInfo[0].approvalComment)
**Reasons for decision:**

 *"$__esc.javascript($requestedItemsStatus[0].approvalInfo[0].approvalComment)"* #end 
#if($requestedItemsStatus[0].approvalInfo[0].approver.name)
**Approver name:**

 *"$__esc.javascript($requestedItemsStatus[0].approvalInfo[0].approver.name)"* #end 

 To view the details of request, go to the [request center](${__global.productUrl}/ui/d/request-center/my-requests).",
            "wrap": true
        }
    ],
    "$schema": "http://adaptivecards.io/schemas/adaptive-card.json",
    "version": "1.2"
}

slackTemplate.blocks:
[{"type": "section","text": {"type": "mrkdwn","text": "$__esc.java($requestedFor.name) is requesting#if($clientMetadata)#if($clientMetadata.requestedAppName) *$__esc.java($clientMetadata.requestedAppName)* with#{else}#end *$__esc.java($requestedObject.name)* access.#{else} access to the *$__esc.java($requestedObject.name)* role.#end To view the details of the request, go to the <${__global.productUrl}/ui/d/approvals/requested-items|Request Center>.
!SOD!
*Reason for requesting:*
#if($requesterComment.comment)$__esc.java($requesterComment.comment)#{else}N/A#end"}},{"type": "actions", "elements": [{"type": "button", "action_id": "access_request_approve_request_action", "text": {"type": "plain_text", "text": "Approve"},"style": "primary", "value":"{"approvalId":"$id","successMessage":"The request has been approved.","canceledMessage":"This request may have been canceled."}"},{"type": "button", "action_id": "access_request_deny_request_action", "style": "danger", "text": {"type": "plain_text", "text": "Deny"}, "value":"{"approvalId":"$id","successMessage":"The request has been denied.","canceledMessage":"This request may have been canceled.","commentRequiredWhenRejected":"$commentRequiredWhenRejected","viewTitle":"Deny Request","viewSubmit":"Deny Request"}"}]}]

name: certification_end_date_modified_notification_name
subject: Access End Date Modified
body:
Your access to the '$accessItemName' $accessItemType is now scheduled to expire on $scheduledSunsetDate.

If you still need access to '$accessItemName' after this date, you will need to request it again to extend the duration of the access.

Please contact the $__global.productName administrator if you have any questions.

name: commonRoleMiningCompletedEmailKey_name
subject: A [${__global.productName}] Common Access Role Discovery Notification
body:
You're receiving this email because you started a Role Discovery session to discover common access roles.

#if($entitlementCount > 0)

Your potential common access role is now ready.

Click here to review and create this new role in ${__global.productName}.

#else

No common access roles were discovered for the defined group of identities. Identities in the defined group did not share highly common entitlements.

#end
